mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where status='Y'
SELECT A.*, B.EMP_NAME FROM notice A JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO WHERE A.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY A.WRITE_NO DESC

AND N.CONTENT LIKE '%' ||#{content}||'%'
